mapper.select: SELECT p.id, p.main_category_id, p.sub_category_id, p.food_country_id, p.user_id, p.title, p.content, p.img_url, f1.name AS rice_food_name, f2.name AS soup_food_name, f3.name AS main_food_name, f4.name AS side1_food_name, f5.name AS side2_food_name, f6.name AS extra_food_name, p.min_calorie, p.max_calorie, p.min_price, p.max_price, p.vote_cnt, p.status, p.created_at, p.modified_at FROM post p LEFT JOIN food f1 ON p.rice_food_id = f1.id LEFT JOIN food f2 ON p.soup_food_id = f2.id LEFT JOIN food f3 ON p.main_food_id = f3.id LEFT JOIN food f4 ON p.side1_food_id = f4.id LEFT JOIN food f5 ON p.side2_food_id = f5.id LEFT JOIN food f6 ON p.extra_food_id = f6.id WHERE p.user_id = #{userId}
SELECT p.title, u.username, p.min_calorie, p.max_calorie FROM post_scrap ps JOIN post p ON ps.post_id = p.id JOIN "user" u ON p.user_id = u.id WHERE ps.user_id = #{userId}
SELECT p.title, u.username, p.min_calorie, p.max_calorie FROM vote ps JOIN post p ON ps.post_id = p.id JOIN "user" u ON p.user_id = u.id WHERE ps.user_id = #{userId}
